attributes.additional_details: Protect the most vulnerable in our society by banning doorstep sales by persons who are putting pressure on them in their own homes to hand over cash for jobs that either (i) does not need to be done or (ii) they do not want, but they are put under pressure to buy. Often it is the elderly who are taken advantage of and lose their life savings to doorstep conmen. Please sign this petition and help have the law changed to protect everyone in our society.
